snippet: The not too hot, not too cold climate has supported the long bull market in stocks.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column contends the not too hot, not too cold economic climate engineered by the Federal Reserve has supported the long bull market in stocks; points out Fed's stimulative polices under Ben S Bernanke have not changed much under new chairwoman Janet L Yellen.
lead_paragraph: The not too hot, not too cold climate has supported the long bull market in stocks.

headline.print_headline: Fed’s Goldilocks Economy Just Right for Stock Investors
headline.main: Fed’s Goldilocks Economy Just Right for Stock Investors
